DOC.detailed_description: It necessary monitor HIV long period time order well understand impact microbicides anti-HIV drug progression HIV infection become infected unknowingly already infect receive drug . The purpose study determine effect microbicides oral anti-HIV drug time HIV infect woman previously enrol microbicide trial . The study remain open accrual duration MTN funding , use two follow-up visit schedule , one base date diagnosis parent study , one base initiation antiretroviral treatment ( ART ) . Participants initiated ART time enrollment study follow schedule base date diagnosis . Participants already begin ART time enrollment follow schedule base date ART initiation . Individuals enrol start date base date ART initiation first follow-up visit Week 2 resume rest schedule . On schedule , follow-up visit occur Months 1 , 3 , 6 every 6 month thereafter . Interim visit may perform time follow-up , participant ask attend final study visit prior termination study . Participants may enroll time HIV diagnosis leave study time . A physical exam ; medical medication history assessment ; blood urine collection ; pelvic , cervicovaginal lavage , vaginal swab sample occur visit . A behavioral assessment occur select visit , adherence social harm assessment occur visit . Sexually transmitted infection risk reduction/contraception HIV-1 secondary counseling occur visit . In addition , condom provide visit reduce HIV transmission . ART provide study .
